description:
Schwarz Bruder goes to the Neo Hong Kong government building and sees the Devil Gundam in there healing. He is noticed by Master Asia, and he flees. He spots Rain following him and carries her to safety.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Relève-toi, Domon ! Le double duel de tous les dangers !
Stand Up Domon! Raging Tag Team Match
Steh auf, Domon! Der rasende Tag-Team-Kampf
Tate Domon! Arashi o Yobu Tag Match
立てドモン! 嵐を呼ぶタッグマッチ
